reviews.review: Still fun to play after all these years, but I think Valve needs to a better job in handling cheaters. It's no fun to play against hackers.

is the best game for ever

so after some time of playing this game what i can say is 
1. Its very toxic, yes the people can be nice at times but the over all people are rude, mostly the bottom fraggers who think they know it all and like to talk shit thinking they're better than everyone. 
2. As of right now the servers are ass, they're laggy and are just overall bad right now. 
3. and last but no least please try not to buy cases / keys, you'll lose so much money (like me). If you see a skin you like go to the steam store or go to a 3rd party to buy the skin (mostly knifes) 
other than those pretty big cons, i think this game is worth the try even if you're bad at it, theres more than just one game on here.
